title: About
subtitle: Learn about the NFX ecosystem and the NFX-Policy project

what.title: What is NFX-Policy?
what.description: NFX-Policy is the deployment and configuration strategy documentation for NebulaForgeX projects. This project provides detailed deployment guides, configuration instructions, and best practices to help users quickly deploy and configure various components in the NFX ecosystem.

ecosystem.title: NFX Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: The NFX ecosystem consists of multiple open-source projects, each with its specific purpose:
items: NFX-Stack: Core resource stack providing foundational services such as MySQL, Redis, and Kafka
NFX-Edge: Multi-website reverse proxy solution based on Traefik
NFX-Vault: SSL certificate management and monitoring system
NFX-Policy: Deployment and configuration strategy documentation (this project)

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: NFX-Policy is an open-source project, and we welcome community contributions. If you find issues or have suggestions for improvements, please visit our GitHub repository to submit Issues or Pull Requests.
